document_data.mainbody:
he Seven Sisters was a lengthy ballad about the Seven Sisters, chosen of the goddess of magic Mystra. The song was written and popularized sometime before 1368 DR.
In 1368 DR, the Seven Sisters was performed by the god Milil, the Lord of All Songs. He imposed the beautiful song on an audience of Sensates from Sigil who were performing a scrying ritual to experience the forbidden experience of spying on Torillian deities.
